translations: v.提升，举起；（使）直立，站立；建造，树立（纪念碑等）（raise 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: The old man moved away, raising his hand in salutation.
sentences.translation: 这位老者离开，举起他的手致意。

sentences.sentence: Raising animals was only secondary to other forms of farming.
sentences.translation: 与其他农业生产相对而言，动物饲养只是副业。

sentences.sentence: He set about raising an army.
